data.name: Sample - Illumio Core - 1.0.0
data.description: Illumio that provides a platform designed to help organizations protect their critical applications and data by creating secure zones and controlling access between workloads, regardless of whether those workloads are on-premises or in the cloud. This connector facilitates automated operations related to workloads, IP list and labels.
